title: Associate sdf::Element with line number in file

content.raw: Currently, during parsing, it is impossible to examine an arbitrary sdf::Thing (or sdf::Element) and provide any feedback on the element and link it to where it came from in the original source file. This definitely handicaps error and warning messages.
content.html: Currently, during parsing, it is impossible to examine an arbitrary sdf::Thing (or sdf::Element) and provide any feedback on the element and link it to where it came from in the original source file. This definitely handicaps error and warning messages.
